availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frederick F. Wallace (Pendleton County farmer and Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Pendleton County farmer and Justice of the Peace. Ohio native. Married Elizabeth Wallace. Pendleton County Justice of the Peace in 1863.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1307. “Frederick Francis Wallace,” Find A Grave, May, 15, 2007, memorial no. 19388045. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Union, District 12, p. 23. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 233. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Catawba, p. 4.
